law.catch_line: Eligibility For Grants And State Aid
law.text: [Text of section effective until July 1 preceding the opening of the Essex North Shore agricultural and technical school. Repealed by 2004, 463, Sec. 1. See 2004, 463, Sec. 18 as amended by 2010, 130, Sec. 7.] A school shall be eligible for all grants and state aid for which regional school districts are eligible. For the purposes of section 12 of chapter 645 of the acts of 1948, the Essex agricultural and technical instituteâ€™s reimbursement percentage shall be 72 per cent.
